column5: MRNS you need to read the first pg of the SA report Winston The search for a new CEO conducted by the BoD is motivated by their desire to see the company at present being helmed by a person who has successfully led neuropsych projects into latestage development and crucially has shepherded one or several neuropsych assets through FDA approval and commercialization
MRNS Capn Winston Chode sure bitches a lot Hope everyone is managing their positions well GLTA and kick your summer off right

MRNS Too many people think because one complains about decisions management makes or doesnt make means that the complainer is weak or not a serious investor NO It is the ones that sit silent and say nothing while the leaders go on not delivering results as promised or make piss poor decisions you are the weak ones Let me tell you I know for a fact that cos monitor social media sentiment You complain gets noticed I am sure this at least helped with the demise of the misguided cashman who was fired Many complaints were sent in and I know they swayed the BOD to take action SO if you see actions you dont like SAY SOMETHING being quiet is not the solution Squeaky wheel gets the grease
